description: Built the real-time backend for a 100K-concurrent messaging platform and launched enterprise pilots in 90 days.
Rebuilt backend APIs with GraphQL and caching, cutting database load 60% and reducing production bugs.
Stress-tested multi-agent LLM systems, identifying 14 failure modes across 10k+ simulations and improving analysis speed 3×.
Built a campus events platform used to create and discover student events, improving search speed and real-time updates.
Led software development for competition robots, building C++ vision and path-planning systems while coordinating code reviews and team execution.
